problem.markdown:
>>Arches primarily resist what type of force?<< ( ) Tension (x) Compression ( ) Shear ( ) Bending
[explanation] Explanation: arches primarily resist compression forces. [explanation]
problem.p: Arches primarily resist what type of force?

choicegroup.label: Arches primarily resist what type of force?

div.p: Explanation: arches primarily resist compression forces.
